rule.ruleDesc: Run JavaScript to Check CMDB Update is done
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript to Check CMDB Update is done (when Always)
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"var formatname=lib.RequestTaskService.getFormName(record);\u000a\u000aif(formatname==\"rm.requestTask.CMDBUpdate\" ){\u000a\u0009record.cmdb_update_has_done = true;\u000a}\u000aif(record.cmdb_update_has_done ==false && record.category != \"Purchase\"){\u000a\u0009record.cmdb_update_has_done = true;\u000a}\u000a\u000avar reccount=0;\u000avar sql = \"requesttask=\\\"\"+record.number+\"\\\" and status~=\\\"closed\\\"\"\u000avar ocmlrec = new SCRecordList( \"ocmlrec\", sql);\u000areccount =ocmlrec.getCount();\u000a\u000aif(record.cmdb_update_has_done ==false && record.category == \"Purchase\" && reccount==0){\u000a\u0009record.cmdb_update_has_done = true;\u000a}\u000a\u000aif((record.CIListContext==null || record.CIListContext.length()==0) && (record.CIListCMDB==null || record.CIListCMDB.length()==0)){\u000a\u0009record.cmdb_update_has_done = true;\u000a}"}
